title: Move in Special! Beautiful 1 Bed Apt Home in Great Location!
posting_body: ['SkyeCrest Apartments', '7846 W. Mansfield Parkway, Lakewood, CO, 80235', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Welcome Home!', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 740 Sq.', 'Ft.', "You'll have views to choose and room to spare at Skye Crest Apartments in Lakewood, CO.", 'Here in a pastoral Lakewood setting, you can choose mountain vistas or overlook the lush greens of neighboring Foothills Golf Course.', "And no matter which style you choose - one, two or three bedroom plans - there's plenty of room for storage and room to spare at Skye Crest.", 'Open floor plans allow you to enjoy your company or keep an eye on the kids as you put the finishing touches on dinner.', 'Breakfast bars.', 'Gas fireplaces*.', 'Nine-foot or cathedral ceilings edged in crown molding and punctuated with ceiling fans.', 'And afterwards, an oval soaking tub to relax and unwind.', 'Tomorrow you can soak up rays at the pool, complete your full workout at the 24-hour fitness center, play with the kids on the sport court and romp with your dog at the dog park - all at your new home at Skye Crest.', "When it's time to start your work week, Skye Crest is mere minutes from both Downtown Denver and DTC and steps away from the RTD Park & Ride.", "And when it's time for fun, Skye Crest offers easy access to Bear Creek Park, the golf courses at Foothills, Broken Tee and Homestead, as well as to the Belmar shopping and entertainment district.", 'Pick your plan.', 'Choose your views.', 'Start enjoying Skye Crest Apartments in Lakewood, Colorado today!', 'Application fee: $38.00 + $4.95 processing fee', 'Features', '- Wheelchair access*', '- 9-foot ceilings with crown molding', '- Mountain views available', '- Multiple outlets for Internet, cable TV and phones', '- Washer/dryer', '- Patios or balconies with storage', '- Custom two-tone paint*', '- Breakfast bars and pantries*', '- Built-in microwaves and self-cleaning ovens', '- Oval soaking tub*', '- Walk-in closets', '- Ceiling fans', '- Gas-burning fireplaces* with custom mantels', '- Cathedral ceilings*', '- Gourmet kitchens with arctic white cabinets*', '* Selected Homes', 'Community Amenities', '- Dog park', '- Private garages* with openers', '- 24-hour business center with free Wi-Fi', '- 24-hour fitness center', '- Year-round spa', '- Pets welcome (ask about breed restrictions)', 'Office Hours', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 am - 6:00 pm', 'Sat: 10:00 am - 5:00 pm', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs and cats welcome.', 'Your pet must have had health check and shots and be spayed or neutered.', 'A signed animal addendum is required to be on file in our leasing office.', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 times the rent', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'r8fY5ezYOS']
